Page.ScreenName: Order Processing End Of Period Listing
Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter (C)ust, (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid option. H C,S,D CUSTOMER,SUMMARY,DETAIL
Enter Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 8 R Enter a valid customer number or (ALL)
Enter (FG),(SA) or (ALL) DropDown PPDField03 1 3 R Enter (FG) Finshed Goods, (SA) Sales or (ALL) for both. H FG,SA,ALL FG,SA,ALL
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Level: 0-Acct,1-Div,2-Dept,3-Cctr DropDown PPDField05 3 3 R Level 0-Account, 1-Division, 2-Department, 3-Cost Center H 0,1,2,3 0,1,2,3
